body: And there are people who say that "All past times were better." Nowadays there are Lolis, tentacles, netorare, ugly bastards and all that horrible stuff to skip... but before, not even the poor wankers could choose.
there's no new translations here, these are just scans of the original US comic releases.
This take me back more than 25 years ago when I discovered hentai.
Lot of uploads lately with no tags, Love the blacklist feature. Not about to take a chance to see how messed up the story gets.
